metadata.title: CVE-2023-2006 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's RxRPC network protocol,within the processing of RxRPC bundles. This issue results from the lack ofproper locking when performing operations on an object. This may allow anattacker to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the contextof the kernel.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-67-generic - 5.15.0-67.74
linux-image-5.15.0-67-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-67.74
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-67-generic - 5.15.0-67.74
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-67-generic-64k - 5.15.0-67.74
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-35-generic - 5.19.0-35.36~22.04.1
